PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Research Scientist Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 16:48 IST
 Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 67,000 to 67,000




FOLLOW

Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and MVSc can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025. Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Chandigarh

PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Research Scientist 	01	MBBS, BDS, MVSc

Age Limit for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 67,00 /- per month.

Application fee for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Research Scientist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully. Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	29-08-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
